qas.question: What was the AFL's average per-game attendance in 2010?

What team drew more than 13,000 fans per game in 2010?

context: In 2010, the first year of the reconstituted league following bankruptcy, the overall attendance average decreased to <a0_0>8,135<a0_0/>, with only <a1_0>one<a1_0/> team (<a2_0>Tampa Bay<a2_0/>) exceeding 13,000 per game.
